definition[0]: a small shop that sells fashionable clothes or other objects
definition[1]: special, good in quality, and expensive, or producing things that are special, good in quality, and expensive
definition[2]: a small, specialized shop selling fashionable goods
example[1]: boutiques such as Cartier and Christian Dior
definition[3]: a small, specialized financial services organization
example[2]: Independent Strategy, a new investment research boutique
